channel.title: highcharter on R %in% c(`Business`)
channel.description: Recent content in highcharter on R %in% c(`Business`)

item.title: Sales Insights using Shiny Modules & Highcharter
item.description: One of the business issues was to figure out a balanced distribution of the world wide and US sales force so as to maximize order dollars. This required figuring out each Product Lineâ€™s geographical strength and weaknesses in terms of Order $$ and a further drill-down on each of the top performers within the product line. Generating insights for each of the products and a summary per their Product Line meant reusing the same shiny app code for each of those products, for which shiny modules provide an efficient approach.

item.title: From Powerpoint to ShinyDashboards & Highcharter
item.description: One of my goals for 2017 was to build and provide presentations as interactive products distributed and accessible to the management team as a web app. Using ShinyDashboards and highcharter: R wrapper for Highcharts for visualization, here is a starter example on shinyapps.
